data.text: @Mel_M116 @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems I said this months ago at my School Board Meetings.

@EB10005116 @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems Agreed. So where are my politicians on both sides of the political spectrum that are going to fight for their constituents? No testing. No mandates. Enough is enough.
@Mel_M116 @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems No testing. No mandates of any kind.
@Mel_M116 @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems GET IT DONE!!!!! This was punitive and discriminatory.
@wishtdream @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems I hope so. How much longer can this possibly go on?
@Mel_M116 @EdTheTruckerNJ @declanoscanlon @Sdimaso @vingopal @SenPresScutari @senatenj @NJSenDems @NJAssemblyGOP @njassemblydems The money has to be running out for this.
